apple_vendor_description: The couple with heart emoji on Apple devices, featuring a medium skin tone, portrays two figures embracing with a prominent heart floating between them, symbolizing deep affection and unity. Apple's design language imbues this emoji with warm, natural skin tones and a softly glowing, perfectly formed heart, all enhanced by realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading. This representation on Apple devices is a heartwarming way to express love, partnership, or a strong bond between two people in digital communication.
